faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Explore common questions about our AI Talking Head, including its features, capabilities, and how it can revolutionize your video creation process.
faq.q1: How do I record audio directly in the browser?
faq.a1: Simply click on the 'Record' tab in the audio input section, then press the microphone button to start recording. You'll see a timer counting the duration of your recording. Click the stop button when finished, and you can preview your recording before using it for your talking head video.
faq.q2: What types of images work best?
faq.a2: Clear frontal portraits work best. The face should be well-lit, with no obstructions, and looking directly at the camera. Neutral expressions typically produce the best results.
faq.q3: How long can my audio be?
faq.a3: For best results, keep your audio under 60 seconds. Longer content may result in lower quality or synchronization issues.
faq.q4: What's the difference between standard and high quality?
faq.a4: High quality processing uses more advanced AI models to create more realistic facial movements and better lip-sync. It costs more credits but produces more natural-looking results.
faq.q5: Can I use the generated videos commercially?
faq.a5: You are responsible for ensuring you have appropriate permission to use both the input image and the resulting video. Always get proper consent from the person in the image before creating or sharing a talking head video.
faq.q6: Can I edit the video after it's generated?
faq.a6: The generated video can be downloaded and then edited with any video editing software of your choice.
faq.q7: Do you store my images or audio?
faq.a7: We temporarily process your media to generate the talking head video, but we don't permanently store your original images or audio files.
faq.a8: Currently we support MP3 and WAV audio formats.
faq.q9: Why does my generated video look unnatural?
faq.a9: The quality depends on the input image quality, lighting, angle, facial expression, and audio quality. Try using a clearer portrait photo with good lighting and a neutral expression for best results.

tips.title: Tips for Best Results
tips.imageQuality: Use a high-quality portrait photo with good lighting
tips.facialExpression: Choose an image with a neutral facial expression
tips.framing: Ensure the face is centered and fully visible in the frame
tips.audioQuality: Use clear audio with minimal background noise
tips.audioLength: Keep audio under 60 seconds for better synchronization
tips.resolution: Higher resolution images produce better results

whatIsSection.title: What is AI Talking Head?
whatIsSection.description: AI Talking Head creates lifelike speaking videos from still images. It animates facial features to match speech patterns using advanced AI technology. Simply upload a portrait photo, record audio or upload an audio file, and watch as the image comes to life!
whatIsSection.recordingCaption: Record your audio directly in browser

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Our AI Talking Head
whyChoose.description: Our AI Talking Head offers several advantages that make it the preferred choice for creating realistic talking videos from still images.

howToSection.title: How to Use AI Talking Head

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.content: Upload a clear portrait photo with good lighting and a neutral expression.

step2.title: Add Voice
step2.content: Record audio directly in your browser or upload an audio file to make your image speak.

step3.title: Customize Options
step3.content: Add an optional prompt and choose your desired aspect ratio and resolution.

step4.title: Generate & Download
step4.content: Click generate, wait for processing, and download your talking head video.

feature1.title: Realistic Lip Sync
feature1.content: Advanced AI ensures precise synchronization between lip movements and speech for natural-looking results.

feature2.title: Record Audio Live
feature2.content: Record your voice directly in the browser or upload pre-recorded audio for ultimate flexibility.

feature3.title: High Quality Option
feature3.content: Choose between standard and high quality rendering depending on your needs and preferences.

feature4.title: Fast Processing
feature4.content: Our optimized AI generates talking head videos quickly without compromising on quality.

feature5.title: Easy to Use
feature5.content: Simple interface makes it easy for anyone to create professional-looking talking head videos without technical expertise.

feature6.title: Style Customization
feature6.content: Add prompts to guide the AI in creating videos with specific moods or presentation styles.
